hero.title: Comfortable Independent Houses for Rent in Sector 57 Gurugram
description: Sector 57 Gurugram is a well-established residential locality located near Golf Course Extension Road, offering excellent connectivity and everyday convenience. People searching for a house for rent in Sector 57 Gurugram prefer this area due to its balanced lifestyle, smooth road network, and proximity to major business hubs. The sector is close to reputed schools, hospitals, local markets, cafes, and shopping complexes, making it a practical choice for families and working professionals.

Independent houses in Sector 57 are known for their spacious layouts, privacy, and peaceful surroundings. The locality offers a mix of affordability and comfort compared to prime Golf Course Road sectors, while still maintaining strong connectivity. Choosing a house for rent in Sector 57 Gurugram ensures comfortable living, stable rental options, and access to modern urban amenities in a well-connected neighborhood.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Houses for Rent in Sector 57 Gurugram
faqSection.description: Common tenant questions related to house for rent in Sector 57 Gurugram.

faqs.question: Is Sector 57 Gurugram a good area to rent a house?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 57 is a well-developed locality with good connectivity, amenities, and a comfortable residential environment.

faqs.question: What types of houses are available for rent in Sector 57?
faqs.answer: Independent houses ranging from 4 Marla to 14 Marla are available to suit different budgets and family sizes.

faqs.question: Is Sector 57 suitable for family living?
faqs.answer: Yes, the sector offers schools, hospitals, parks, and a peaceful neighborhood ideal for families.

faqs.question: Are furnished houses available for rent in Sector 57?
faqs.answer: Yes, furnished and semi-furnished houses are available depending on the property and landlord.

faqs.question: What is the average rent in Sector 57 Gurugram?
faqs.answer: Rental values vary based on plot size, furnishings, and exact location, offering both mid-range and premium options.

faqs.question: How is connectivity from Sector 57?
faqs.answer: Sector 57 is well-connected via Golf Course Extension Road, Rapid Metro, and major city roads.

faqs.question: Are bachelors allowed to rent houses in Sector 57?
faqs.answer: Some landlords allow bachelors, while others prefer families. This depends on owner policies.

faqs.question: Is Sector 57 safe for tenants?
faqs.answer: Yes, the locality is considered safe with an established residential community.
